data.name: subject_EditMessage
data.value: Projects [$ProjectTitle]. Discussion Edited: $EntityTitle

data.name: pattern_EditMessage
data.value:
h1.Discussion Edited: "${EntityTitle}":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
$__DateTime "$__AuthorName":"$__AuthorUrl" has edited the discussion: "${EntityTitle}":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"":
$AdditionalData.get_item("MessagePreview")
#foreach($fileInfo in $AdditionalData.get_item(""Files"").Keys)
#beforeall
----------------------------------------
#each
"$fileInfo":"$AdditionalData.get_item("Files").get_item($fileInfo)"
#end
"Read more":"${__VirtualRootPath}/products/projects/messages.aspx?prjID=$ProjectID&ID=$EntityID"
^You receive this email because you are a registered user of the "${__VirtualRootPath}":"${__VirtualRootPath}" portal. To change the notification type, please manage your "subscription settings":"$RecipientSubscriptionConfigURL".^
